ModMetaData.name: [MLP] My Little RimPony (for RimWorld v1.0)
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description:
This version of My Little RimPony is compatible with RimWorld 1.0, but please be aware that a lot of things are different compared to the version compatible with the latest version of the game. Some things may be changed, while other things may have been removed entirely; you can refer to the list below for details.
* Removed elite mercenary pawns from NPC faction as they use armour introduced in Royalty. * Removed references to vegetarian fine/lavish meals, as they were added in Ideology. * Regular mercenary pawns from the NPC faction will use flak armour, as recon armour was added in the 1.1 patch (Source: RimWorld wiki). * The Brony Community scenario no longer starts with horses, as they were added in the 1.1 patch (Source: RimWorld wiki). * Researching the Evil Sisters statues doesn't require techprints, but the research cost has been increased to 8500. * Scootaloo now increases movement speed by 15% (only because I couldn't think of anything else). * Nurse Redheart has been removed. * Sweetie Bot turrets has been removed. * The Orbital Friendship Cannon has been removed. * The Izzy Moonbow plush has been removed. * The tennis ball launcher has been removed. * The anti brony trait has been removed. * No patches for other mods will be applied. * Bronies don't get mood buffs from equipping plushies. * Bronies will have a negative opinion of pawns with either of the 'Ugly' traits. * Bronies don't have a positive opinion of other bronies.
